summary: This is an internal email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated June 29, 2019, discussing preparatory steps for an anticipated arrest of Jeffrey Epstein. The email attaches draft documents for an unsealing request and a victim notification webpage, indicating the office was preparing for imminent legal action.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Author of the email, coordinating preparatory legal documents for the anticipated arrest of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Preparation for Epstein Arrest
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney emails colleagues to coordinate preparatory legal documents, including an unsealing request and a victim notification draft, for the anticipated arrest of Jeffrey Epstein.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: The email, dated June 29, 2019, shows federal prosecutors were actively preparing for the arrest of Jeffrey Epstein.
Preparatory documents included a request to unseal court materials and a draft for a victim notification webpage.
The communication indicates the arrest was anticipated and steps were being taken to ensure a swift public and victim notification process upon its execution.
